title: Laser is not being displayed properly in raring+hydro

content.raw:
When installing the raring version of drcsim (using hydro as ROS distro) and trying to visualize the LaserScan with the gazebo Topic Visualization tool, nothing is shown in the visualizer. This is happening using gazebo 2.1.0 and gazebo-prerelease 2.2.1. If I open RVIZ, the LaserScan is shown really close to the robot head.

Confirmed also in the system of @caguero .
